	import { List } from '@rokkit/core'
	import { items } from './data.js'
	import Odd from './Odd.svelte'
	import Even from './Even.svelte'

files.name: data.js
files.content:
export let items = [
	{
		name: 'Fruits',
		photo: '/examples/fruits.jpg',
		artist: 'https://www.pexels.com/@hellojanedoan/',
		description:
			'Fruits are sweet, juicy, and fleshy foods typically eaten raw as a snack or used as ingredients in various dishes and desserts.',
		type: 'odd'
	},
	{
		name: 'Vegetables',
		photo: '/examples/vegetables.jpg',
		artist: 'https://www.pexels.com/@jill-wellington-1638660/',
		description:
			'Vegetables are plant-based foods typically eaten cooked or raw and enjoyed as side dishes or main courses.',
		type: 'even'
	},
	{
		name: 'Nuts',
		photo: '/examples/nuts.jpg',
		artist: 'https://www.pexels.com/@martabranco/',
		description:
			'Nuts are dry fruits that grow on trees and bushes and have a hard shell surrounding the edible kernel. They are often enjoyed as snacks or used as ingredients in various dishes and desserts.'
	},
	{
		name: 'Spices',
		photo: '/examples/spices.jpg',
		artist: 'https://www.pexels.com/@mareefe/',
		description:
			'Spices are aromatic plants or plant parts used to add flavor and aroma to food. They can be used fresh, dried, or powdered to enhance the taste of dishes and beverages.'
	}
]

files.content:
<script>
	import { Accordion, Link } from '@rokkit/core'
	import { items } from './data.js'

	const fields = {
		text: 'category',
		children: 'values',
		isOpen: 'isOpen',
		fields: {
			text: 'name',
			image: 'photo',
			url: 'source'
		}
	}
	const using = { default: Link }
</script>

<Accordion {items} {fields} {using} />

files.content:
<script>
	import { Accordion } from '@rokkit/core'
	import { items } from './data.js'
	import Odd from './Odd.svelte'
	import Even from './Even.svelte'

	let fields = {
		text: 'category',
		children: 'values',
		fields: { component: 'type', text: 'name', image: 'photo' }
	}
	let using = { odd: Odd, even: Even }
</script>

<Accordion {items} {fields} {using} />

files.name: App.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { FieldLayout } from '@rokkit/form'
	import { fields } from './layout.js'

	let data = {
		name: 'hello',
		age: 20,
		data: [
			{ name: 'Panda', url: '/1', component: 'Link' },
			{ name: 'Monkey' },
			{ name: 'Viper', icon: 'sun', component: 'Link' }
		],
		male: false
	}
</script>

<FieldLayout bind:value={data} items={fields} />

<script>
	let className = ''
	export { className as class }
	export let vertical = false
</script>

<nav-content class="flex w-full h-full {className}" class:flex-col={vertical}>
	<slot name="nav" />
	<slot name="content" />
</nav-content>

files.name: App.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { ResponsiveGrid } from '@rokkit/core'
	import { ButtonGroup } from '@rokkit/form'
	import PlaceHolder from './PlaceHolder.svelte'

	let items = [
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 1',
			props: {
				content: 'AAA',
				class: 'bg-pink-500 items-center justify-center'
			}
		},
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 2',
			props: { content: 'BBB', class: 'bg-sky-500 items-center justify-center' }
		},
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 3',
			props: {
				content: 'CCC',
				class: 'bg-teal-500 items-center justify-center'
			}
		}
	]
	let size = 'sm'
	let page = items[0]
</script>

<ButtonGroup items={['sm', 'md', 'lg']} bind:value={size} />
<ResponsiveGrid
	{items}
	small={size == 'sm'}
	class="demo-col {size}"
	bind:value={page}
/>
{#if size == 'sm'}
	<ButtonGroup {items} fields={{ text: 'name' }} bind:value={page} />
{/if}

<style>
	:global(.demo-col) {
		@apply w-full h-full grid;
	}
	:global(.demo-col.md) {
		@apply grid-rows-3 grid-cols-1;
	}
	:global(.demo-col.lg) {
		@apply grid-rows-2 grid-cols-2;
	}
</style>

files.name: PlaceHolder.svelte
files.content: {content}

files.name: App.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { ResponsiveGrid } from '@rokkit/core'
	import { ButtonGroup } from '@rokkit/form'
	import PlaceHolder from './PlaceHolder.svelte'

	let items = [
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 1',
			props: {
				content: 'AAA',
				class: 'bg-pink-500 items-center justify-center'
			}
		},
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 2',
			props: { content: 'BBB', class: 'bg-sky-500 items-center justify-center' }
		},
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 3',
			props: {
				content: 'CCC',
				class: 'bg-teal-500 items-center justify-center'
			}
		},
		{
			component: PlaceHolder,
			name: 'Page 4',
			props: {
				content: 'Page 4',
				class: 'bg-yellow-500 items-center justify-center'
			}
		}
	]
	let size = 'sm'
	let page = items[0]
</script>

<ButtonGroup items={['sm', 'md', 'lg']} bind:value={size} />
<ResponsiveGrid
	{items}
	small={size == 'sm'}
	class="four-col {size}"
	bind:value={page}
/>
{#if size == 'sm'}
	<ButtonGroup {items} fields={{ text: 'name' }} bind:value={page} />
{/if}

<style>
	:global(.four-col) {
		@apply grid w-full h-full;
	}
	:global(.four-col.md) {
		@apply grid-cols-2;
		@apply grid-rows-2;
		grid-template-areas:
			'c-1 c-2'
			'c-3 c-4';
	}

	:global(.four-col.md > .col-1) {
		grid-area: c-1;
	}
	:global(.four-col.md > .col-2) {
		grid-area: c-2;
	}
	:global(.four-col.md > .col-3) {
		grid-area: c-3;
	}
	:global(.four-col.md > .col-4) {
		grid-area: c-4;
	}
	:global(.four-col.lg) {
		@apply grid-rows-4 grid-cols-1;
	}
</style>

files.name: App.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { brewer, Swatch } from '@rokkit/chart'
	let variations = brewer().pattern().brew()
</script>

<Swatch items={variations} type="circle" size={60} columns={4} autoscale />

files.name: App.svelte
files.content:
<script>
	import { brewer, Swatch } from '@rokkit/chart'
	import { Select } from '@rokkit/input'

	let index = 0
	let shades = brewer().color().brew()

	$: variations = brewer()
		.pattern()
		.filter(index)
		.colors(shades)
		.variants(8)
		.brew()
</script>

<Swatch items={variations} type="circle" size={60} columns={4} autoscale />

patterns.name: Pattern
patterns.description: Various fill patterns for use with chart elements.
